Address.label: Address
Address.value: TAIYANGGONG MIDDLE ROAD,18TH FLOOR, GRANDYVIC BUILDING, BEIJING, 100020, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kanzhun Ltd runs an online recruitment platform called BOSS Zhipin. This platform mainly focuses on assisting the recruitment process between job seekers and employers for enterprises and corporations. The employers, mainly executives or middle-level managers of businesses, could participate directly in the recruiting process. It generates revenue by providing services to enterprise customers and job seekers to assist in the recruitment process over mobile apps and websites.
